attributes.action: use his or her influence and persuade London 2012 to invite Yang Peiyi to sing at the opening ceremony.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yang Peiyi was not allowed to sing at the opening ceremony in 2008. She was not deemed flawless by Olympic officials.

She's a child. Describing her as "not flawless" is cruel and inappropriate.

Inviting her to London 2012 is a subtle but very British way of showing disapproval for the actions of Bejing officials.

reasons: The names of individual officials of public bodies, unless they are part of the senior management of those organisations
